trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 分析器以生成与交互<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The TextBoxControlBuilder class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: TextBoxControlBuilder 类是一个内部帮助程序类，用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder>类是一个内部帮助程序类，用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether white-space literals are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否允许空白文本。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>若要忽略中的白色空间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the literal string of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否的文本字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref>控件必须解码的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlDecodeLiterals method to determine whether the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HtmlDecodeLiterals 方法来确定是否的文本字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件必须解码的 HTML。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method always returns `true` to indicate that the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的此实现始终返回`true`，则指示的文本字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件必须解码的 HTML。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。
